items.title: Who is Karin Immergut, the judge who ruled against Trump in Portland?

items.title: Many American Jews sharply critical of Israel on Gaza, Post poll finds
items.description: Most Jews say Israel is committing war crimes — and 39 percent say genocide — while often distinguishing between the country and its leadership.

items.title: David Hogg makes first midterms endorsement against an incumbent Democrat
items.description: Hogg, who gave up his position in party leadership, but had yet to make good on his promise to challenge incumbents.

items.title: Supreme Court won’t hear Ghislaine Maxwell’s appeal
items.description: Maxwell, an imprisoned associate of deceased financier Jeffrey Epstein, has argued she was improperly prosecuted.
